item.title: SakaZan - Falling In Love (Feat.Natalie Major)
item.description:
작곡: SakaZan, Natalie.. / 작사: SakaZan, Natalie..
KY: 96279

Tell me you want me
give me a sign
Look in my eyes
I imagine
You can remember
the sound of my voice
Through all the noise
and take me to heaven
Cuz I can see
the girl in the mirror
You can tell that
she’s willing to try
Baby I can’t see
the world any clearer
Without you
by my side
Show me
what it feels like
Under the sun
just say
You want me
cuz I’m ready to know
What it feels like
finding the one
Let’s stop
the world tonight
I think
I’m falling in love
I think
I’m falling in love
Let’s stop the world
tonight
I think
I’m falling in love
There ain’t a reason
I don’t believe
In all the dreams
I’ve been havin’

magic
Coming my way
nothings the same

what happened
Cuz I can see
the girl in the mirror

she’s willing to try

with you
